Kung Fu Panda

Rank: 22


To everyone's surprise- including his own- Po- an overweight- clumsy panda- is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.


Director: Mark Osborne

Writer: Jonathan Aibel, Glenn Berger, Ethan Reiff

Stars: Jack Black, Ian McShane, Angelina Jolie

Tags: Animal Adventure, Computer Animation, Kung Fu, Martial Arts, Slapstick, Wuxia, Action, Adventure, Animation, Comedy
